name: FREE Merry Christmas Gift Tags!
description:
+ + + + PLEASE DO NOT PURCHASE THESE IMAGES + + +
+ + + + ++ + + + + YES THESE ARE FREE + + + + + + + + +

Simply click image to enlarge it then right click and save (please note this option gives you an image smaller than original and less quality).
For best results, email me and I will send you the high quality original version to your email ASAP. You do not have to purchase anything to receive this please just ask.

+ + + + Please do not sell this file in digital form + + + +

+ + + + + + ++ + + I HAVE NEW FREEBIES EVERY MONTH ! + + + + + + + + + + + 
Please follow me on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or sign up for our Newsletter! 

This is a Digital Download with my original watercolor.
Custom designed and digitally created by me.

Printable Digital Sheet size 8.5" x 11" PDF

Digital Image Sheets are a very economical way to fill your craft needs and get instant gratification at the same time. Just choose the ones you like, download them and print.
You can print these sheets as many times as you want!

IMPORTANT MY TERMS OF USE

♥ You may use it for your personal needs.
♥ You may not sell this in digital form, or add to any web pages.
♥ Not to be used in a product that is mass produced.
♥ Each image now contains my signature in tiny lettering to identify it belongs to me.
♥ If you buy my art to re-sell in your shop you MUST give credit back to me and a link to my shop.
♥ Copyright remains with me.
♥ You may share this free image.

* * * Real colors may slightly differ from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings and is not under our control.

Copyright Mari Robeson - All rights reserved - 2013

name: 2014 Calendar
description:
Our 2014 Calendar is here! Inspired by the fun Cabanas of times past. Zebras & Pineapples add whimsy & color to this original design by Mari Robeson. Printed on Legal Size card stock. 8 1/2" x 14"
Ships flat.

Also looks great with our Pineapple Party Print & Tea Towel!

Copyright 2013 © Mari Robeson

Care: Some designs may fade with regular washing. Steam iron to remove wrinkles. Tea Towels get softer with each wash.

Also looks great with our coordinating Tea Towel & 2014 Calendar! All would make a wonderful hostess gifts!

name: Turquoise Chaz Pillow
description:
Turquoise Chaz 16" x 16" pillow slip cover with zipper enclosure. Looks great paired with many of our designs. Sewn right here in Sunny California! 

Care: We recommend spot cleaning. Some designs may fade with regular washing. Steam iron to remove wrinkles.

name: Yellow Chevron
description:
Yellow Chevron 16" x 16" pillow slip cover with zipper enclosure. Looks great paired with many of our designs. Sewn right here in Sunny California! 

Care: We recommend spot cleaning. Some designs may fade with regular washing. Steam iron to remove wrinkles. Premier Print Fabric.

name: Lab Lovin' Pillow
description:
Bright and bold in cobalt blue and sunny yellow, this little guy will cheer up any room! 16" x 16" Pillow Slip. Insert not included (this saves a lot on shipping!) Zipper enclosure. Made right here in Sunny California! This is an original design by Mari Robeson and is a limited edition. 

Care: We recommend spot cleaning. Some designs may fade with regular washing. Steam iron to remove wrinkles.
Sometimes our fabric will need to be printed on demand and may take up to 3 weeks to ship. I will let you know when your order is received.

Copyright 2012 © Mari Robeson

name: Mod Quad Daisy!
description:
16" x 16"  Square Pillow Slip. Zipper Enclosure. Great for an accent in any room and any also looks darling with our ELovePhants & Loved Collections. Printed on organic cotton and made in the USA. This is an original design by Mari Robeson and is a limited edition. Pillow Cover Only.

Care: We recommend spot cleaning. Some designs may fade with regular washing. Steam iron to remove wrinkles.
Sometimes our fabric will need to be printed on demand and may take up to 3 weeks to ship. I will let you know when your order is received.

Copyright 2013 © Mari Robeson

name: ELovephant Personalized Print
description:
Personalized ELovephant Print. Please send us a convo on what initials you would like. This archival print is an original graphic design by Mari Robeson. Printed on 300 gsm Optima Smooth paper with a 100+ year color fast life. Frame is not included. This product is created on demand and can take up to 3-4 weeks to ship. 11" x 14"  Ships flat. 

Copyright 2013 © Mari Robeson

name: ELovePhants 16" x 16"
description:
This sweet design was inspired by my daughter's collection of Elephants. Square pillow with zipper enclosure. Great for an accent in any room and is part of our entire ELovePhant collection! Printed on organic cotton twill and made in the USA. Looks great with our coordinating personalized art print. This is an original design by Mari Robeson. Pillow Cover Only. 

Care: We recommend spot cleaning. Some designs may fade with regular washing. Steam iron to remove wrinkles.
Sometimes our fabric will need to be printed on demand and may take up to 3 weeks to ship. I will let you know when your order is received.

Copyright 2013 © Mari Robeson

name: Mod Moroccan In Coral & Black
description:
The listed price is for one yard 36" x 56".
Customization of color is available.

Mari Robeson fabric is printed on 7 oz. Organic Cotton Twill in the U.S.A. and is a great weight for your home decor or crafting projects. This design is a limited edition. Sometimes our fabric will need to be printed on demand and may take up to 3 weeks to ship. I will let you know when your order is received.

Free Shipping over $50!
Care: We recommend spot cleaning. Some designs may fade with regular washing. Steam iron to remove wrinkles.

Copyright 2013 © Mari Robeson

name: Mod Moroccan Wrapping Paper
description: This beautiful Mod Moroccan Wrapping Paper is an original design of Mari Robeson Copyright 2011. Printed on both sides with 2 original designs. Thick glossy paper size 24" x 36". Stunning to wrap your gifts with or simply hang on the wall as ART! The price is for 4 sheets. Individual sheets are available for $2.50 each. Limited Quantities available. Great to give as a teacher or hostess gift!
